original_text: Then shall ye do unto him, as he had thought to have done unto his brother: so shalt thou put the evil away from among you.
korean_text: 그가 그의 형제에게 행하려고 꾀한 그대로 그에게 행하여 너희 중에서 악을 제하라

sentences.original_text: Then shall ye do unto him
as he had thought to have done unto his brother
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 형제에게 행하려고 생각했던 것 같이

sentences.original_text: so shalt thou put the evil away from among you
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 너는 너희 중에서 악을 제거하리라
